name: Fruit Machine (Commodore Computing International)
overview: A fairly basic implementation of a fruit machine game developed by Bill Russell and published as a type-in listing in the following: - Commodore Computing International v02-06 (Oct 1983) - The book "CBM 64 Programs - Volume 1" This is a simple fruit machine game. It incorporates nudges, holds, and sound effects. Each symbol is represented by a string of three characters.
